overview: Kate is secretly betrothed to a struggling journalist, Merton Densher. But she knows her Aunt Maude will never approve of the match, since Kate's deceased mother has lost all her money in a marriage to a degenerate opium addict. When Kate meets a terminally ill American heiress named Millie traveling through Europe, she comes up with a conniving plan to have both love and wealth.
tagline: A couple with everything but money. An heiress with everything but love. A temptation no one could resist.
cast: Helena Bonham Carter|Linus Roache|Alison Elliott|Elizabeth McGovern|Charlotte Rampling
